home.name: Laszlo Lelovics
home.description: I'm a motivated and goal-oriented {role} who loves building modern and user-friendly web applications. I continuously learn and improve to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends.

experience.title: Professional Experience and Education
experience.jobDescription1: Participated in the development of Laravel and Vue.js based web applications, handling both backend and frontend tasks.
experience.jobDescription2: Collaborated with other developers to implement business requirements and helped maintain code quality.
experience.jobDescription3: Maintained existing applications and added new features to enhance user experience.
experience.jobDescription4: Developed websites and webshops based on design plans using WordPress and WooCommerce platforms.
experience.educationDescription2: During the computer programmer course, I gained extensive knowledge in various aspects of software development, including programming languages, database management, algorithms, and software development methodologies.
experience.educationDescription3: Throughout the course, I successfully completed several projects within a team environment, where I developed not only practical experience but also my problem-solving skills.

contact.title: Let's Get In Touch
